label: Einstein Field Equations from Variation
mathematical_goal: Derive Einstein field equations from variational principle as foundation for gravitational sector
theoretical_significance: The Einstein field equations emerge from varying the Einstein-Hilbert action with respect to the metric. This provides the classical limit of gravity that PM extends to include G2 geometric corrections. The trace equation R = 4*Lambda - 8*Pi*G*T connects spacetime curvature to matter content.
derivation_chain: Variation: yields Einstein equations with cosmological constant
